title: Lokomotiv Stadium (Nizhny Novgorod)
text:
The Lokomotiv Central Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Nizhny%20Novgorod">Nizhny Novgorod</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and was the home ground of <a href="FC%20Olimpiyets%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">Olimpiyets Nizhny Novgorod</a>. The stadium holds 17,856 people and was opened in 1932. It underwent its most recent reconstruction in 1997. It should not be confused with the Lokomotiv Central Stadium in Moscow, the home of <a href="Lokomotiv%20Moscow">Lokomotiv Moscow</a>.
Presently, it is the home arena of <a href="FC%20Olimpiyets%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">Olimpiyets Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
